title: Frantic Search for Survivors Stretches Into a Second Day
content: As many as 159 people remained unaccounted for Friday afternoon, dozens more than officials had estimated a day earlier, as rescuers used trained dogs and sonar in a frantic search through the rubble of the Champlain Towers condo complex in South Florida.

title: Collapsed Miami condo had been sinking into Earth as early as the 1990s, researchers say
content: A Florida high-rise that collapsed early Thursday was determined to be unstable a year ago, according to a researcher at Florida International University. The building, which was constructed in 1981, has been sinking at an alarming rate since the 1990s, according to a study in 2020 by Shimon Wdowinski, a professor in the Department of Earth and Environment.

title: DHS official told lawmakers there's concern about Trump August reinstatement conspiracy theory
content: A Department of Homeland Security (DHS) official told members of Congress on Wednesday that there is concern in the department regarding conspiracy theories that former President Trump will be reinstated in August, Politico reports.

title: China Says U.S. 'Doesn't Care About Xinjiang People,' Wants to Suppress Region's Development
content: In response to the U.S. customs agency blocking imports of polysilicon from Hoshine Silicon Industry Co. for allegedly using forced labor from ethnic minorities in the Xinjiang region, a Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesperson on Friday said that Washington was using "human rights as a disguise" to "suppress industrial development of Xinjiang."
